title: Keith Murdoch, Father Of Media Baron, Disclosed Disaster At Gallipoli
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel interviews Australian journalist Peter FitzSimons, author of Gallipoli, about how Keith Murdoch defied military censors and got the word out about how badly the battle was going.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
